name: EARTHSHIELD
description:
Defend the planet against alien invaders in this classic top-down arcade shooter. Multiply your score faster by making enemies appear faster with the shoulder buttons.

Download EARTHSHIELD™ today!

Playable on PS3™ and PSP® systems.

One-time license fee for downloads to up to 2 console systems and 2 portable systems that are associated with the purchasing account.
